title: Good Omens | Shippest Thou Aziraphale & Crowley? | Stuff You Like
author: Jill Bearup
comment: "they use their learned free will to care about each other" i love this so much. i haven't read the book but i did watch the miniseries. i didn't think i was going to end up shipping them because it seemed too obvious and cliche, but now I just can't help shipping it to pieces.
Lol and now 4 years later, all you've said has been more than validated by Neil Gaiman's script.
Jill, have you seen the BBC / Amazon adaptation of Good Omens? They got it almost perfect. They almost ship the angel and the sauntering vaguely downwards demon.
I love the idea of learned free will. :) They definitely care about each other very deeply.
I love Good Omens. And Yes, Crowley and Aziraphale love each other. Regardless if it's Asexual or Sexual.
description:
Az and Crowley! 

Or: Good Omens, shipping, slash, asexuality, all that fanfic, and why we love their relationship (whatever it is) so much.
